verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>. I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> the YY <WH3068> with my whole heart <WH3824>, in the assembly <WH5475> of the upright <WH3477>, and in the congregation <WH5712>.
The works <WH4639> of the YY <WH3068> are great <WH1419>, sought out <WH1875> <WH8803> of all them that have pleasure <WH2656> therein.
His work <WH6467> is honourable <WH1935> and glorious <WH1926>: and his righteousness <WH6666> endureth <WH5975> <WH8802> for ever <WH5703>.
He hath made <WH6213> <WH8804> his wonderful works <WH6381> <WH8737> to be remembered <WH2143>: the YY <WH3068> is gracious <WH2587> and full of compassion <WH7349>.
He hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> meat <WH2964> unto them that fear <WH3373> him: he will ever <WH5769> be mindful <WH2142> <WH8799> of his covenant <WH1285>.
He hath shewed <WH5046> <WH8689> his people <WH5971> the power <WH3581> of his works <WH4639>, that he may give <WH5414> <WH8800> them the heritage <WH5159> of the heathen <WH1471>.
The works <WH4639> of his hands <WH3027> are verity <WH571> and judgment <WH4941>; all his Mitzvot <WH6490> are sure <WH539> <WH8737>.
They stand fast <WH5564> <WH8803> for ever <WH5703> and ever <WH5769>, and are done <WH6213> <WH8803> in truth <WH571> and uprightness <WH3477>.

He sent <WH7971> <WH8804> redemption <WH6304> unto his people <WH5971>: he hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> his covenant <WH1285> for ever <WH5769>: holy <WH6918> and reverend <WH3372> <WH8737> is his name <WH8034>.

The fear <WH3374> of the YY <WH3068> is the beginning <WH7225> of wisdom <WH2451>: a good <WH2896> understanding <WH7922> have all they that do <WH6213> <WH8802> his Mitzvot: his praise <WH8416> endureth <WH5975> <WH8802> for ever <WH5703>.
